body_html:
Quite sure that 3e6c638 would have fixed the original issue... If you update your tf version to the latest one, it works..

The // case is a little more complex since in some file systems paths have //'s in them... so I'd recommend just not having them in the path :)
body_text:
Quite sure that 3e6c638 would have fixed the original issue... If you update your tf version to the latest one, it works..
The // case is a little more complex since in some file systems paths have //'s in them... so I'd recommend just not having them in the path :)
body:
Quite sure that https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/3e6c638727c3274908a7c9c6bbf4474c014511fe would have fixed the original issue... If you update your tf version to the latest one, it works.. 

The // case is a little more complex since in some file systems paths have //'s in them... so I'd recommend just not having them in the path :)
